subject: RE: [junit] Integrating Jemmy and Junit
msgSnippet: ... There is an example at the bottom of http://jemmy.netbeans.org/samples.html (so if you just googled a little bit and looked a little bit harder, you would
messageBody:
Sumit wrote:
> Hi All,
>
> I've Been Looking Forward to Integrate the Two Frameworks But
> got No Success. Can Someone Send in Some Piece of Code On How to
> integrate the Two at Code Level, i.e. Where implement Scenario and
> where to Extend TestCase and How to Overwrite runit() method and how
> to make Test Cases, I hope you have understood my problem... Plzz
> Reply Soon.
>
> Looking Forward to ur Replies,

There is an example at the bottom of http://jemmy.netbeans.org/samples.html
(so if you just googled a little bit and looked a little bit harder, you
would probably have been able to get your answer even sooner...)

Take care, Ilja
